basic.description: A course in contemporary French civilization as seen through various media: books, newspapers, and the cinema.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le cinéma et la civilisation française

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN100 or FREN110 or (FREN101 and FREN102).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN232 or FREN312 or FREN300.
